### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/MFT1_2.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/MFT1_2_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: MFT1.2.web.orig**, version v3.0) testing 
 - Web navigation (**code: MFT1.2.web.orig**, version v2.0) discarded 
 - Web navigation (**code: MFT1.2.web.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MFT1.2.IM.orig**, version v1.0) discarded 
 - Indicative Map (**code: MFT1.2.IM.orig**, version v0.2) replaced 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **USGS-Mangroves-2011** (Giri C et al. 2011).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset             |url                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
|:-------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|USGS-Mangroves-2011 |<https://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/4>{target='links'} :: <https://sedac.ciesin.columbia.edu/data/set/lulc-global-mangrove-forests-distribution-2000>{target='links'} :: <https://developers.google.com/earth-engine/datasets/catalog/LANDSAT_MANGROVE_FORESTS>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:

**MFT1.2.web.orig** (v2.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/MFT1.2.web.orig_v2.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (EFG map)](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091027){target="gisdata"} :: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MFT1_2_web_orig){target="gisdata"} :: [Earth Engine assets](projects/earthengine-legacy/assets/users/jrferrerparis/IUCN-GET/L3_IndMaps/){target="gisdata"}

**MFT1.2.web.orig** (v1.0): [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.MFT1_2_web_orig){target="gisdata"}

**MFT1.2.IM.orig** (v1.0): [Google Cloud bucket](gs://iucn_get_l3_im/MFT1.2.IM.orig_v1.0.tif){target="gisdata"} :: [Zenodo repository (bundle of maps)](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3958934){target="gisdata"}

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset             |license_info                                                                                                                                                               |
|:-------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|USGS-Mangroves-2011 |UNEP-WCMC General Data License :: http://www.unep-wcmc.org/policies/general-data-license-excluding-wdpa#data_policy :: For commercial use, please contact business-support |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Giri C, Ochieng E, Tieszen LL, Zhu Z, Singh A, Loveland T, Masek J, Duke N  (2011) *Status and distribution of mangrove forests of the world using earth observation satellite data* **Global Ecology and Biogeography** 20: 154-159 [DOI:10.1111/j.1466-8238.2010.00584.x](http:dx.doi.org/10.1111/j.1466-8238.2010.00584.x)
